headline: CDT Insider Sentiment June 2025: Mid-Year Engines Check
summary: Positive trade developments, lighter-than-expected inflation readings and a resilient labor market supported equity prices in June. However, we note that risk remains historically expensive.

headline: Vistra appoints Kim Jenkins as Group Chief Executive Officer
summary: Vistra, a leading provider of essential business solutions that help organisations to invest and grow efficiently and compliantly across the world, is pleased to announce the appointment of Kim Jenkins as Chief Executive Officer (CEO). Kim Jenkins succeeds Simon Webster who has served as CEO since 2022. Simon will leave the company on 4 July, returning to Europe to be with his family.
